suggest.silverstripe/geoip: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED: Native Silverstripe way to work out the customer country. Make sure this work on your server, before installing it - otherwise it is useless.
suggest.silverstripe/restfulserver: adds restful server functionality to your e-commerce site (creates an API for your e-commerce application, allowing third-parties to tap into your e-commerce data)
suggest.tractorcow/silverstripe-geocoding: adds geocoding for easy address recognition.
